meanings.definition: Arguing or raising objections about a trivial matter
meanings.sent1: She is always quibbling about small details.
meanings.sent2: Stop quibbling and focus on the main issue.
meanings.sent3: The quibbling over who gets the last cookie was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Their quibbling over the color of the curtains was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The constant quibbling made the meeting feel never-ending.

meanings.definition: Engaging in petty or trivial arguments
meanings.sent1: Their quibbling behavior is getting tiresome.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand all this unnecessary quibbling.
meanings.sent3: The quibbling over who should take out the trash was unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: The siblings' constant quibbling was like background noise.
meanings.sent5: The quibbling among the students was disrupting the class.

meanings.sent1: Her quibbling attitude is causing delays.
meanings.sent2: The quibbling responses were slowing down the process.
meanings.sent3: The quibbling over the font size on the poster was unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: His quibbling nature was like a small pebble in the shoe.
meanings.sent5: The constant quibbling was making everyone frustrated.
